attributes.action: Stop the UN helping nation states conduct State Terrorism in the name of fighting Terrorism
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The UN made up of nation states choose to engage in mass murder of civilians in the name of fighting terrorism. The reality is that no such teerorism would have taken place in many internal conflicts like sri lanka, kashmir, sudan, kosovo (free at last) tibet, the list is endless, which is part of the problem. Nations fear any liberation will have a comulative effect and force many more nation states to also free more and more people of this earth. The is no TERRORISM without STATE TERRORISM.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
